name: Web Sense
explanation: While in contact with a web, the [%name%] knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

name: Antimagic Aura
explanation: An invisible barrier surrounds the [%name%] and its equipment. It is impervious to most magical effects including spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities. It prevents the functioning of any magic items or spells within its confines, thus preventing the target from casting spells or using spell-like abilities or magic items for the duration.

name: Dark Energy Absorption
explanation: Any dark energy that the [%name%] is affected by, is instead absorbed healing the [%name%] by the same damage that would have been dealt.

name: Amphibious
explanation: The [%name%] can breathe air and water.

name: Magic Resistance
explanation: The [%name%] gains +2 to resist magical effects.

name: Lie Detector
explanation: The [%name%] will know if it's lied to.

name: Heated Body
explanation: Any creature that touches [%name%], or hits it with a melee attack, takes 1d8 fire damage.

name: Sense Magic
explanation: The [%name%] will know if magic is used within 120 feet of it.

name: Shapechanger
explanation: The [%name%] can change into a creature of similar size. All attributes remain the same, only appearances change.

name: Fey Ancestry
explanation: The [%name%] gets +2 to resist being charmed, and magic can't put the [%name%] to sleep.

name: Poison Resistance
explanation: The [%name%] gets +2 to resist poison effects.

name: Keen Smell
explanation: The [%name%] gets +2 to perception checks that rely on smell.

name: Keen Sight
explanation: The [%name%] gets +2 to perception checks that rely on sight.

name: Keen Hearing
explanation: The [%name%] gets +2 to perception checks that rely on hearing.

name: Telepathic Bond
explanation: The [%name%] can communicate telepathically with creatures of the same type, or their master.

name: Beserk
explanation: Whenever the [%name%] starts its turn with 25% of its hitpoints or fewer the [%name%] goes beserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [%name%] attacks the nearest creature it can see. This lasts until it is killed, or regains all of its hit points.

name: Lesser Regeneration
explanation: At the start of each turn, [%name%] regains hit points equal to its CON.

name: Barbed Hide
explanation: At the start of each turn, [%name%] deals 1d10 physical damage to any creature grappling it.

name: Speak with Beasts
explanation: The [%name%] can speak with beasts as if they shared a common language.

name: Burrower
explanation: The [%name%] can burrow through non-magical earth and stone without disturbing the material it moves through.
